description: Composite numbers n such that digits of prime factors of n are either 2 or 3.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: dpfQ[n_]:=Module[{d=Union[Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Transpose[ FactorInteger[ n]][[1]]]]},!PrimeQ[n] && (d=={2}||d=={3}||d=={2,3})]; Select[Range[ 1000], dpfQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 24 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 1998.
